english.segment1: Like a string around my finger. Like a note up on the wall. Or a tap upon my shoulder. From a friend I owe a call
english.segment2: And I know I should remember. All the things that I believe. But troubled times have a way. of clouding your memory. Chorus: Remind me. Pursue me. Bring Your wonder back to my memory. You are faithful. I'm forgetful. Of the way that You are always graceful. So let Your love remind me
english.segment3: Like a string around my finger. Like a much needed sign. Or an unexpected letter. Coming at the perfect time
english.segment4: And I know I should remember. All the things that I believe. But troubled times have a way. of clouding your memory. Chorus
